index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of a supplemental agreement in the amount of One Hundred Twenty Six Thousand Three Hundred Four Dollars ($126,304) with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for joint law enforcement activities in the South Precinct in support of "Operation Safe Home;" accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
